Articles.Content:
So, the newest one came out today:

http://youtu.be/wxDOpAM2FrQ

What does everyone think of this stuff? Personally, I think it\'s amazing, without seeing Glorious Dawn I probably would not know about KSP right now. It was a pretty powerful thing when I first saw it.

Oh, I love these! Melodysheep is a genius.

Bought the album... can\'t stop listening.

So glad there\'s a new one. Thanks.
Yes, I bought the album as well. It\'s really great stuff, every last song. I do have to say, I liked the unbroken thread a bit better, but I\'ll give it another listen with my high quality headset
